transcript: I don't think a lot of people realize that you no longer wear Crocs I bought like 40 pairs of shoes on Amazon that were all barefoot shoes and I ended up liking Crocs the most what are you rocking right now these are some sandals I wear these because I can wear these in the most environments because I can wear these to the gym which I actually really like I can wear these in water I can wear these on the beach they're closed toe so I can wear them most restaurants and I don't have to wear socks so it's like what else do you need they also have a foam bottom like rubber stuff makes your foot sweat underneath Crocs for example make your feet get sweaty yeah feet don't sweat in these yeah someday I'll make the mosey Mosey moccasin
